text:
Dick Helling (22 September 1950 – 30 December 2018) was a Dutch professional footballer who played as a midfielder. He was born in Zaandam, Netherlands. Helling began his career with Telstar, and also played for Ajax, before spending 8 seasons with Volendam, for whom he scored 48 goals in 218 games in all competitions.
Helling died on 30 December 2018 from a stroke in The Hague, aged 68.
